name: Caraway Pork Sausages With Red Wine
keywords: appetizer, main course, caraway seeds, dry red wine, pork shoulder, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free
recipeIngredient: 3 pounds pork shoulder or butt, put through medium or coarse grinder
3/4 cup dry red wine, like a cabernet sauvignon
Salt and coarsely ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients, and using sausage stuffer, stuff into casing, twisting and tying at 3- or 4-inch intervals. Prick with fork.
Place in boiling water; reduce heat and blanch for 5 minutes after water returns to a boil.
To serve, broil or grill. Serve with coarse-grained mustard.
